name: Buzzwords
description:
"Scrabble meets Go"

Buzzwords is a hexagonal board game about spelling words to capture territory. Play online against a friend, or alone against the Computer.

Spell words to capture tiles

Use any letters on the board to form a word. You'll capture any letters you play that touch your territory, or form a chain back to your territory. Go for the flower - you get an extra turn if you destroy your opponent's flower tile. Wipe out your opponent to win.

Play it your way

Play in the browser completely free at https://buzzwords.gg, or download the desktop app below for convenient access and push notifications when it's your turn.

Linux builds coming soon!
